approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the specified owner address.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender can spend on behalf of the owner.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens held by the specified address.

cap.description: Returns the maximum number of tokens that can be created.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used to define token precision.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance for a spender by the specified subtracted value.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance for a spender by the specified added value.

mint.description: Mints new tokens to the specified account.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

owner.description: Returns the address of the current owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership.description: Renounces ownership of the contract, leaving the contract without an owner.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made for a spender to withdraw tokens.

OwnershipTransferred.description: Emitted when ownership of the contract is transferred.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another.
